parts:
MESSAGE FROM: Master Planner
MESSAGE TO: Time Keeper

Time Keeper, please provide the current date and time. This will help in scheduling the trip activities.

ADDITIONAL RESOURCE:
No additional resource

```yaml
thoughts: >
    Okay, I need to provide the current date and time to the Master Planner. I will use the Time Tool to get the current date and time in the default format and then send it to the Master Planner.
name: send_message
params:
    agent_name: Master Planner
    message: "The current date and time is 2024-01-03 14:35:00."
    additional_resource: null
```
